title: CAN'T INVITE FRIENDS TO GAMES & BLINDPICK SAYS EVERYONE MUST CHOOSE A ROLE TO START
body:
I haven't been able to invite a summoner and my other friends couldn't invite him as well. He logged in again and could find his own matches but he couldn't invite or be invited into anyone's lobby.

The blindpick lobby also and its "find match" button saying that people needed to choose roles in order to start. I later couldn't inv or be invited to a lobby with a summoner I had been playing with for 2 games in a row. Invites either sent and didn't show up or just didn't go through at all. This only happened with some summoners.

replies.body: Hey, are you guys all on the same network or is your friend at a different location?  It sounds like he could be having network issues reaching matchmaking services.  Have him try the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  If the issue persists, have him put in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can ehlp him out directly.
